forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly this evening. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
